member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the configuration type of a camera control.

member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_TYPE.MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_TYPE_PRESTART
member.summary: The camera control must be configured before streaming begins.

member.name: MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_TYPE.MF_CAMERA_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_TYPE_POSTSTART
member.summary: The camera control must be configured after streaming has started.
